import React, { useState } from 'react' import './navigation.component.scss' import Logo from '../../components/logo/logo.component' import MenuIcon from '../../components/MenuIcon/MenuIcon.component' import Menu from '../../components/Menu/Menu.component' export default function Navigation() { const [showMenu, setShowMenu] = useState(false) console.log('showMenu', showMenu) let menu if(showMenu){ menu =
setShowMenu(false)}>
} return (
setShowMenu(!showMenu)}/>
{menu}
) }
